How to Activate the Dark Theme on YouTube: 5 Steps (with Pictures) 
 Home Random Browse Articles Notifications Add to This Page Add Tip Easy Ways to Help Approve Questions Review Tech Feedback Fix Spelling More Things to Try...   
 Log in / Sign up   
 Desktop Site   
 Community Tested How to Activate the Dark Theme on YouTube   
 YouTube has a dark theme. This turns the background of the page black (and some parts dark gray) and makes the text lighter. Using the dark theme can be extremely helpful at night to prevent eyestrain. 
 Steps Edit 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/5\/58\/YouTbe-URL.png\/460px-YouTbe-URL.png","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/5\/58\/YouTbe-URL.png\/760px-YouTbe-URL.png","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":257.8021978022,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":425.93406593407} 
 1 
 Enable the experimental interface .  Go to  youtube.com  in your web browser.
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/d\/dc\/YouTube-Profile-pic.png\/460px-YouTube-Profile-pic.png","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/d\/dc\/YouTube-Profile-pic.png\/760px-YouTube-Profile-pic.png","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":253.37912087912,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":418.62637362637} 
 2 
 Click your user profile picture (if signed in) or the  ⋮  symbol if signed out.  One of the two controls will be present at the top-right corner of the webpage.
 The  ⋮  symbol is the one on the webpage. Don't confuse it with the identical Google Chrome "Customize and control Google Chrome" button. 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/4\/46\/Turn-on-Dark-Theme-in-YouTube.png\/460px-Turn-on-Dark-Theme-in-YouTube.png","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/4\/46\/Turn-on-Dark-Theme-in-YouTube.png\/760px-Turn-on-Dark-Theme-in-YouTube.png","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":339.94505494505,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":561.64835164835} 
 3 
 Click  Dark Theme:  Off. It contains a crescent icon.
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/2\/25\/Activate-Dark-Theme-in-YouTube.png\/460px-Activate-Dark-Theme-in-YouTube.png","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/2\/25\/Activate-Dark-Theme-in-YouTube.png\/760px-Activate-Dark-Theme-in-YouTube.png","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":274.86263736264,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":454.12087912088} 
 4 
 Enable dark theme.  Toggle the slider next to "ACTIVATE DARK THEME".
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/4\/4b\/Dark-Theme-in-YouTube.png\/460px-Dark-Theme-in-YouTube.png","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/4\/4b\/Dark-Theme-in-YouTube.png\/760px-Dark-Theme-in-YouTube.png","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":217.99450549451,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":360.16483516484} 
 5 
 Finished.  The background of YouTube will darken. To turn off dark theme and switch back to the light theme, re-access the setting and toggle off the slider.

								Answered by  
								 Redstoneplankz , Top Answerer
 If it is not the desktop version of YouTube, it will not work.
